item.title: What is GRASS GIS ?
item.description: General information Geographic Resources Analysis Support System, commonly referred to as GRASS, is a Geographic Information System (GIS) technology built for vector and raster geospatial data management, geoprocessing, spatial modelling and visualization. GRASS GIS is Free, Libre and Open Source Software released under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL v2). GRASS GIS is also a founding member and an affiliated project of the Open Source Geospatial Foundation .
